name: Glamazon Escape
description:
(I recommend the PC version, webgl is kind of terrible in many ways)

Glamazon, the online retailer owned by Geoff Bozos, is known for abusing packages! He even claims to personally kiss each box before it's shipped. The horror! 

 You play as a frightened package which must escape without being caught, or worse, being kissed by Geoff!  Make your daring Glamazon Escape!

(I would really need far more than 7 days to finish this idea, but at least the title screen gives an idea of what I would have liked to have done in the levels.)
